name: Fog in the Forest
promptSnippet: Inspired by fog in the forest, mysterious but calm atmosphere.

material1.description: Medium dark grey chevron vinyl flooring with irregular tone, wood-effect finish. Soft matte finish, subtle grain, gentle variation in tone.

material2.description: Dark grey marble with dramatic, busy pattern: mixed charcoal, grey, and subtle warm inclusions, irregular mineral texture

material3.description: Garrison gray colour with blue undertone.

material4.description: Matte dark brown cabinet fronts with fine horizontal wood grain texture
